answerText: Laguerre polynomials [10] The Laguerre polynomials give the radial solution to the wavefunctions of this type of quantum mechanical system, consisting of an electron orbiting a proton.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | Carnegie Mellon University and University of Central Florida | 4 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These mathematical objects constitute an orthonormal set of polynomials and are typically defined by the Rodrigues relation. For ten points each:   [10] Identify these polynomials which solve the equation "x times y-double prime plus quantity one minus x times y-prime plus n times y equals zero," where n is an integer.
